pkgmetadata.longdescription: MultiDimensional Feature Selection // Functions for MultiDimensional Feature Selection (MDFS): calculating multidimensional information gains, scoring variables, finding important variables, plotting selection results. This package includes an optional CUDA implementation that speeds up information gain calculation using NVIDIA GPGPUs. R. Piliszek et al. (2019) doi:10.32614/RJ-2019-019.
